content: this does not seem to affect the look of the sbtch how to do crab s-tch this is somebmes called reverse single_crochet start with a standing single_crochet then insert hook in the sbtch before the one you started in pull through a loop yo pull through to finish sbtch conbnue like this working anbclockwise around the piece assuming working right-handed there will be videos on the internet to explain more clearly it feels very odd to start with but once you are in the swing it makes a very nice neat rolled edge that doesn t stretch much pot of pansies copyright 2025 le6ce rose square worked to round 13 round 14 starbng the background pot of pansies copyright 2025 le6ce rose round 15 conbnuing the background round 16 pot of pansies copyright 2025 le6ce rose round 17 round 19 pot of pansies copyright 2025 le6ce rose
